issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Build & run KS for BB on simulator or device.
2.Goto controls tab.
3.Goto slider -> basic.
4.Might be you can try other tests with controls on navbar & toolbar.

Actual Results:
1.We do not see any controls on navbar & toolbar.

Expected Results:
1.We should see the expected controls on navbar & toolbar.

Controls that should appear on navbar & toolbar:
* Slider
* Progress Bar
fields.summary: KitchenSink : Controls are not visible on navbar & toolbar in BlackBerry
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201301231719
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130131073359
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
Win 8 
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386

comments.body: toolbar and navbar are iOS only features.
